definition: (classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
Medvedyev (name)/Dmitry Anatolyevich Medvedev (1965-), Russian lawyer and politician, president of Russian Federation from 2008
Najaf (city in Iraq, a Shia holy city)

sentences.english: Jeff lowered himself to a ledge five feet down and tried to calm them.
sentences.chinese: 杰夫爬下一块五英尺高的礁石，欲安抚他们。

sentences.english: Megeve ski station started its season early thanks to the recent snowfalls.
sentences.chinese: 最近的降雪已拉开了梅杰夫滑雪站的赛季。

sentences.english: Hear Devan and Jeff talk about their dreams.
sentences.chinese: 听听德凡和杰夫如何谈论他们的梦。

sentences.english: I also asked Jeff to talk to Colonel Holmes.
sentences.chinese: 我也请求杰夫与霍尔姆斯上校谈谈。

sentences.english: Thanks to Jeff, I'm still able to afford him.
sentences.chinese: 多亏了杰夫，让我还能养得起这熊孩子。

sentences.english: Obama and Medvedev have scheduled a four-hour session for Monday.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马和梅德韦杰夫计划在周一举行四个小时的会谈。

sentences.english: I have more time to think these days, Jeff…I'm proud of you.
sentences.chinese: 这阵子我有更多的时间想些事情，杰夫，我为你自豪。

sentences.english: You think Jeff is the right choice for Britta.
sentences.chinese: 你认为杰夫是布瑞塔的最佳选择。

sentences.english: I put the silencer on my gun and Jeff did the same.
sentences.chinese: 我在枪上装上消声器，杰夫也把消音器安好。

sentences.english: Jeff had just turned left down a dirt road.
sentences.chinese: 杰夫将车向左拐上了一条土路。

sentences.english: The Jeffrey features a beer garden and 35-foot bar.
sentences.chinese: 杰夫瑞有一个啤酒花园和35英尺的酒吧。

sentences.english: Currently, Jeff is the good English teveryer at Hthe goodgzhou EF smart school.
sentences.chinese: 目前，杰夫在杭州英孚担任英语老师。

sentences.english: Geoff’s eyes skitter over the surface.
sentences.chinese: 杰夫的眼睛向周围扫视一下。

sentences.english: We called at Jeff's convenience store on the way home.
sentences.chinese: 我们在回家的路上在杰夫的超商停了一会。

sentences.english: I am very impressed with Geoff Morris 's "Do It Yourself Handyman Guide".
sentences.chinese: 我很印象杰夫莫里斯的“做你自己做电工指南”。

sentences.english: President Medvedev also called for tough punishment against officers who will abuse their position.
sentences.chinese: 梅德奥杰夫亦对滥用职权的官员予以重罚。

definition: Steven (name)/Simon Stevin (1548-1620), Flemish engineer and mathematician, played a key role in introducing the decimal system to Europe
